name: opelopaba
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1))

|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)

-| diffsw(s1, w1)

comment: The law of concretion. Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
